author: parithosh
content:
The holesky fork is in the next hour. Please make sure your nodes are updated to the latest release of your client!

In case there are issues, we will meet in the voice channel on the eth R&D discord server: https://discord.com/channels/595666850260713488/814925424726900766

Tools for debugging:
- https://light-holesky.beaconcha.in
- https://forky.holesky.ethpandaops.io/
- https://tracoor.holesky.ethpandaops.io/
- Lab: https://lab.ethpandaops.io/xatu-data?network=holesky

author: parithosh
content:
We've finalized the holesky fork epoch, there is a participation drop we're tracking - but it seems like un-updated clients so far and not a bug per say. There are few orphaned blocks we're trying to debug as well. 

We'll go through testing all the EIPs and report back in a few hours, but it looks good on first glance.
